name: Drop's Survival
description:
GROUP: Kobe Darko, Tejas Sateesh, Wendy Shi

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS - movement
  • SPACE - jump
  • Q, Z or Left Mouse - shoot bubbles
  • R - restart in game

CREDITS:

Tiles and BG - Seasonal Tilesets : https://grafxkid.itch.io/seasonal-tilesets

Slime - https://opengameart.org/content/animated-slime

End Screen BGM - A Place I Call Home : JRPG Music Pack #4 [Calm] by Juhani Junkala

Game BGM - Special Delivery : Messenger Boy Soundtrack by Trevor Lentz

SFX:

  • Start Screen - Blue Screen of Death
  • freesound.org
  • opengameart.org
